mapper.insert: insert into ED_INTERFACE_PARAM (PK_ID, INTERFACE_ID, SEQ, NAME, DESCRIBE, TYPE, NOTE, COL_TYPE) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interfaceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{colType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ED_INTERFACE_PARAM set INTERFACE_ID = #{interfaceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIBE = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COL_TYPE = #{colType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, INTERFACE_ID, SEQ, NAME, DESCRIBE, TYPE, NOTE, COL_TYPE from ED_INTERFACE_PARAM
